sentence: Abrams, who is running unopposed for the Democratic nomination for governor of the Peach State, lost a close race to Republican Brian Kemp in 2018.
author: Matt Leach
title: Georgia voters condemn Stacey Abrams worst state comments, share top priorities ahead of primary election

author: Tia Mitchell
title: The Jolt: David Perdue targets Gov. Brian Kemp's prized Rivian deal
